attributes.action: include recycling of disposable nappies in government recycling targets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The technology exists to recycle disposable nappies. Recycling the nappies is a more effective means of getting rid of them than filling up expensive landfill sites. I petition the Prime Minister to include the recycling of disposable nappies in government recycling targets
